attributes.action: An immediate General Election to stop the evil Tories destroying our country
attributes.additional_details: All the evidence needed is widely available in social media
attributes.background: The Conservative party today have cut £30 a week from ESA, money which disabled people depend on to survive while lining their own pockets by giving MP's pay rises. We are tired of Austerity, we have lost faith in our government that only got in with 50% votes in the first place.
